(row = 8, col = 17)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 8, col = 17)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed from the last state, it is likely that I need to take a different action to progress in the game. 

Analyzing the current position:
- Avatar is located at (8, 17), where it can see the following nearby entities:
  - On its left (8, 16) is a lever (`*`).
  - On its right (8, 18) is another lever (`b`).
  - Below (9, 17) is a lever (`&`).

Given the position of the levers near the avatar, it might be beneficial to interact with one of them. I will try to manipulate the left lever, as it might open up new paths or allow me to control the direction of the suitcase effectively.

``` Action:1 ```
I expect this action to help rotate the avatar towards the lever and possibly interact with it on the next turn, aiding in progressing towards collecting passengers without causing negative interactions.
